parameters.name: ApprovalStatus
parameters.description:
The approval status based on which the model versions are queried. Valid values:

*   Pending
*   Approved
*   Rejected

parameters.name: FormatType
parameters.description:
The model format used to filter model versions. Valid values:

*   OfflineModel
*   SavedModel
*   Keras H5
*   Frozen Pb
*   Caffe Prototxt
*   TorchScript
*   XGBoost
*   PMML
*   AlinkModel
*   ONNX

parameters.name: FrameworkType
parameters.description:
The framework used to filter model versions.

*   Pytorch -XGBoost
*   Keras
*   Caffe
*   Alink
*   Xflow
*   TensorFlow

parameters.name: Label
parameters.description: The label. Model versions whose label key or label value contains a specific label are filtered.

parameters.name: ModelId
parameters.description: The model ID. You can call [ListModels](~~461944~~) to obtain the model ID.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which the entries are sorted by the specific field on the returned page. Default value: ASC.

*   ASC
*   DESC

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: The field used to sort the results. The GmtCreateTime field is used for sorting.

parameters.name: SourceId
parameters.description:
The source ID.

*   If the source type is Custom, this field is not limited.
*   If the source type is PAIFlow or TrainingService, the format is:

<!---->

    region=<region_id>,workspaceId=<workspace_id>,kind=<kind>,id=<id>

Take note of the following parameters:

*   region is the region ID.
*   workspaceId is the ID of the workspace.
*   kind is the type. Valid values: PipelineRun (PAIFlow) and ServiceJob (training service).
*   id is a unique identifier.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The source type used to filter model versions. Valid values:

*   Custom (default)
*   PAIFlow
*   TrainingService

parameters.name: VersionName
parameters.description: The model version used to filter model versions.
